name: media-converter
title: Media Converter
description: This extension converts video, image, and audio files using FFmpeg
author: leandro.maia

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Media
commands.subtitle: Media Converter
commands.description: Converts a media file to a different file format

tools.name: convert-media
tools.title: Convert Media
tools.description: Convert an image, video or audio file to a different file format

ai.description:
- Always use absolute paths for the input path. 
- Never guess the input path or use placeholder values. If you are unsure, ask the user for the input path. 
- After a successful conversion, return a link to the absolute path of the converted file.

evals.input: @media-converter convert the last mp3 file in @finder downloads to wav
@media-converter convert all png files on my @finder desktop to webp
@media-converter convert my last screen recording in @finder downloads to webm
@media-converter convert the heic photos in @finder desktop to jpg

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: ffmpeg_path
preferences.title: Custom FFmpeg Path (Advanced)
preferences.description: OPTIONAL - If left empty, the extension will look for a valid FFmpeg binary executable at common paths. If not found (expected for most users), you will be prompted to download a lightweight FFmpeg binary only available to this extension.

preferences.name: moreConversionSettings
preferences.title: More Conversion Settings (Advanced)
preferences.label: More granular control over the conversion
preferences.description: Will allow you to choose precise encoding mode, bitrate and more for videos, sample rate, bit depth and more for audios.
